Definition: In this task, you are given a review of a food product from Amazon. Your task is to rate the product on a scale of 1 to 5, with 1 being extremely poor, 2 being poor, 3 being neutral or mixed, 4 being good, and 5 being extremely good.

Positive Examples.input: I have bought several of the Vitality canned dog food products and have found them all to be of good quality. The product looks more like a stew than a processed meat and it smells better. My Labrador is finicky and she appreciates this product better than  most.
Positive Examples.explanation: The user really seem very satisfied with the product and gave good review worthy of 5 stars rating.

Positive Examples.input: Product arrived labeled as Jumbo Salted Peanuts...the peanuts were actually small sized unsalted. Not sure if this was an error or if the vendor intended to represent the product as "Jumbo".
Positive Examples.explanation: The customer seemed disappointed with the product he received. He really seems very unsatisfied that he didn't get what he was shown in the description. So he gave 1 star.

Positive Examples.input: This seems a little more wholesome than some of the supermarket brands, but it is somewhat mushy and doesn't have quite as much flavor either.  It didn't pass muster with my kids, so I probably won't buy it again.
Positive Examples.explanation: The customer seems very neutral to the product where he finds it wholesome and also didn't get the flavor he expected.

Negative Examples.input: My daughter loves twizzlers and this shipment of six pounds really hit the spot. It's exactly what you would expect...six packages of strawberry twizzlers.
Negative Examples.explanation: It's supposed to generate if the rating is out of 5.

Negative Examples.input: I ordered this product for a themed baby shower. They went over well and they tasted just like normal cracker jacks. Loved that I could find the box and they fit perfect in favor bags.
Negative Examples.explanation: The customer is happy with the product so they can't give it 1 star.

Negative Examples.input: My cats have been happily eating Felidae Platinum for more than two years. I just got a new bag and the shape of the food is different. They tried the new food when I first put it in their bowls and now the bowls sit full and the kitties will not touch the food. I've noticed similar reviews related to formula changes in the past. Unfortunately, I now need to find a new food that my cats will eat.
Negative Examples.explanation: The customer is really unsatisfied with the product so they can't give it 5 stars.

Instances.input: The sodium and sugar (often corn syrup) in tomato sauces is frightening.  Plus, w/them you eat white pasta to boot but w/salsa you eat rice and beans.  Trust me - don't buy your sauces around your meals, get salsa and plan meals around it.  They arrived in a day or two and the bottles were shiny and fresh, I was afraid of warehouse dust and old stock.  The vendor did really well.

Beware of this vendor.  All other K-Cups are sold 2 packs of 24 for this price.  I ordered several brands in one order assuming that these are the same 2 pack of 24 quantity and was surprised when I only received one box of 24.  Went back and looked at my and sure enough the description did not state 2 boxes as other brands / suppliers.  Beware when ordering and just pick a different vendor.

Trident "Strawberry Twist" sugarless gum is very disappointing, both in taste and consistency. The strawberry flavor is very artificial tasting and, though I guess it is a good thing, not very long lasting. The gum also gets "stringy" fairly quickly.  I chew a lot of gum, but will not be buying this flavor again.  Not Recommended!  CFH

I had high expectations based on some reviews, but aside from the apple, these were mostly blech and my baby did not like them.  The consistency of the squashes was very pasty, and the peas tasted like powder.  I ended up just using them to sneak extra nutrition in other dishes (the squash wasn't bad mixed with mashed potatoes, but I couldn't put in too much or the little guy was on to me!).  The apple was actually a really nice consistency, a little bit of texture and tasted quite delicious.  I definitely recommend getting the variety pack before launching into a big box of one kind.  It's a great idea, but won't work for everyone.

This morning, for the first time in my life, I tried Mahogani Caribou Coffee only because I had run out of my usual type of coffee, which I would usually brew and drink. In short, I should not even categorize Mahogany Caribou as coffee!!!! You know why? It has far more anti-depressant and uplifting effect on me than I had previously anticipated. From now on, I will only drink Mahogany Caribou.

When I got my Keurig I fell in love. I bought a bunch of different sample packs and two boxes of the grove square hot cocoa. I'm a bit of a hot cocoa nut, partially because I can't have caffeine, and partially because it brings back wonderful memories of playing in the snow and the fun of warming up afterwards. I really wanted to love this hot cocoa. I tried all three flavors multiple times, in different ways. I tried them on the different cup sizes, adding things, etc. There's just this strange taste to them that doesn't sit well on the tongue. I'm not sure what it is, but it has a faint ring of sour milk. It really lingers, and I haven't found anything that takes the taste away. I'm going to give my second box to a friend, she doesn't seem to notice it. My daughter and husband both said it tasted weird, so it's not just me. I also took it to a friend's house and have tried them in three different Keurig machines, JUST to make sure mine didn't need to be descaled. So I guess my suggestion is to try it before you go for the multiple boxes.

We found this on our recent trip to England and had to find it as soon as we got home. It's a standard for the Brits, and for us now too.  It's been around FOREVER. You can use it in so many ways; pies, trifle, donuts, cakes, by itself with fresh fruit and whipped cream, or even on french toast!

The flavor of Big Train Hazelnut is not significant. One has to add a lot to have a flavor impact. Of the three Big Train flavors I purchased (including Vanilla and Irish Creme), Hazelnut is the least satisfactory. (Vanilla's a little better; Irish Creme is best--I gave that one 4 stars).
